content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
All or Nothing You take a -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until you score a critical hit.

Melee
Close to the Ear You are deafened until the end of your next turn.

Ranged
Pins and Needles You are sickened 3.

Unarmed
Why Me? You provoke reactions as if you used a move action.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #41
